name: .XBA File Extension
summary: Learn about .XBA files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Application library or macro used by OpenOffice, an open-source productivity suite; contains the functionality for the component and is written in the OpenOffice.org Basic programming language; used for storing the source code for software add-on components.

content: An OpenOffice.org library is comprised of the XBA file and other configuration files, which specify the contents and user interface elements for the component. The XBA filename corresponds to the module name.
NOTE: OpenOffice.org Basic files that contain encrypted and password-protected source code use the .PBA extension.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
